content: Is it possible (or can it be made so) for the IG Publisher to render examples from the relevant element in the Structure Definitions of extensions in a 'code snippet' format? These might be displayed on a separate 'Examples' Tab or, possibly the Content Tab of the Structure Definition. Implementers in NZ are telling me that they would benefit from this type of example, rather than trawling thorough the complete SD in the XML or JSON Tabs.
You can submit an issue against the IG Publisher. Agree it would be nice to have
